text: Journey is an indie video game developed by Thatgamecompany. The game is published by Sony Computer Entertainment. It was released for the PlayStation 3 in March 2012. Journey was the first video game to be nominated for a Grammy Award. In Journey, the player controls a figure in the mantle in a large desert, traveling towards a mountain. Reviewers of the game said visual art and sounds of Journey and interaction with strangers that the player meets on the road were very good. Journey won several "game of the year" awards. == Other websites== *Official site == References== Category:2012 video games Category:Adventure games Category:Art games Category:Fantasy video games Category:Indie video games Category:IOS games Category:Multiplayer and single- player video games Category:PlayStation 3 games Category:PlayStation 4 games Category:PlayStation Network games Category:Sony Interactive Entertainment games Category:Video games developed in the United States Category:Windows games
title: Journey (2012 video game)
